main event: Two yellow lights were observed from an airliner while five yellow lights were seen stationary.
interesting points: The lights were seen at 39,000 feet above the Pacific Ocean., The report suggests that marine aircraft were dropping illuminating flares and ordnance at the time of the sighting., The flares were reportedly visible from as far away as 70 miles., The observation was conducted on May 6 at 12:062342 GMT., This information is part of the Project Blue Book archive.
sighted object: two yellow lights and five yellow lights
